scripts.build:ios:create: yarn run build:prepare && npx eas device:create
scripts.build:ios: yarn run build:prepare && npx eas build --clear-cache --profile development --platform ios --no-wait
scripts.build:android: yarn run build:prepare && npx eas build --clear-cache --profile development --platform android --no-wait
scripts.deploy:testnet:android: EXPO_NODE_ENV=testnet EXPO_PLATFORM=android yarn run build:prepare && npx eas build --clear-cache --auto-submit-with-profile=production --no-wait --non-interactive --platform android --profile testnet
scripts.deploy:testnet:ios: EXPO_NODE_ENV=testnet EXPO_PLATFORM=ios yarn run build:prepare && npx eas build --clear-cache --auto-submit-with-profile=productionTestnet --no-wait --non-interactive --platform ios --profile testnet
scripts.deploy:testnet: yarn run deploy:testnet:android && yarn run deploy:testnet:ios
scripts.deploy:staging:android: EXPO_NODE_ENV=staging EXPO_PLATFORM=android yarn run build:prepare && npx eas build --clear-cache --auto-submit-with-profile=production --no-wait --non-interactive --platform android --profile staging
scripts.deploy:staging:ios: EXPO_NODE_ENV=staging EXPO_PLATFORM=ios yarn run build:prepare && npx eas build --clear-cache --auto-submit-with-profile=production --no-wait --non-interactive --platform ios --profile staging
scripts.deploy:staging: yarn run deploy:staging:android && yarn run deploy:staging:ios
scripts.deploy:production:android: EXPO_NODE_ENV=production EXPO_PLATFORM=android yarn run build:prepare && npx eas build --clear-cache --auto-submit-with-profile=production --no-wait --non-interactive --platform android --profile production
scripts.deploy:production:ios: EXPO_NODE_ENV=production EXPO_PLATFORM=ios yarn run build:prepare && npx eas build --clear-cache --auto-submit-with-profile=productionMainnet --no-wait --non-interactive  --platform ios --profile production
scripts.deploy:production: yarn run deploy:production:android && yarn run deploy:production:ios
scripts.start: NODE_ENV=development yarn run build:prepare && NODE_ENV=development npx expo start --dev-client --clear
